vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateDeposit.cashOut (patch_1.sol#30-37):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_1.sol#32-35)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_1.sol#33)
